TopicTitle: Phantom Debris spawns behind vessel during flight.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: micro engineer, custom flags, cheat menu | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: i7-10870H | GPU: RTX 3070 | RAM: 16GB

 

I didn't manage to get screenshots of this one at the time but there's a weird bug with one of the craft I built that every km or so it generates a new floating "debris" marker whereever it was at the time. They have no physical presence, do not interact or crash with the craft, and do not move but they keep on appearing inside it whenever it's flying. They don't show up on the flight log as anything happening to the vessel either.

 

I've included a file of the craft from around the time the bug was happening that I'd submitted for a different bug.

 

Included Attachments:

brokenwings.zip

Edited July 8, 2023 by Anth12

Update: Have determined Phantom Debris or something that spawns inside the craft like it does sometimes collide with vessels, causing them to crash mid-air.

With one craft the debris is represented by an RCS thruster (on a craft with no RCS)(pictured), other times it is invisible (this craft did have RCS thrusters)(not pictured, because it was invisible). It also does not show up on some crafts.
